metadata.title: CVE-2019-19553 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
In Wireshark 3.0.0 to 3.0.6 and 2.6.0 to 2.6.12, the CMS dissector could crash. This was addressed in epan/dissectors/asn1/cms/packet-cms-template.c by ensuring that an object identifier is set to NULL after a ContentInfo dissection.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-19553` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwireshark-data - 3.0.7-1
libwireshark15 - 3.0.7-1
libwiretap12 - 3.0.7-1
libwsutil13 - 3.0.7-1
tshark - 3.0.7-1
wireshark - 3.0.7-1
wireshark-common - 3.0.7-1
wireshark-gtk - 3.0.7-1
wireshark-qt - 3.0.7-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wireshark package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.7-1').
